Comments_List: This was a great class for credit for an unpaid film internship. Absolutely worth it! It was great to discuss everyone's experiences in the industry!
The strength of this class was its informal style! More clarification on the final paper would be phenomenal.
It was interesting to hear everyone else's experiences of interning.
Yes! It's worth it if you had an unpaid film internship!

If you do an internship over the summer, I would recommend this. I had to take it, as my internship required interns to receive college credit, but there isn't much work and it makes sense to take if you are already getting an unpaid internship.
